sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; const About = () => (

About

{/* About Me */}

About Me

I am an experienced indexer with many years in the indexing business, the sole proprietor of Bhavya Solutions Indexing and its only indexer. Indexing projects are never subcontracted. I compile informative indexes that reflect the well the style, concepts and topics convered in the text. I specialize in back-of-the-book indexing, embedded indexing, and abstracting services.

I was featured in the spotlight section of the October 2022 issue of ASI's monthly newsletter, see also and Summer 2023 edition of the ISC/SCI Bulletin.

{/* Education */}

Education

Specialized certificate in copyediting from University of California, San Diego. Indexing training course from the American Society of Indexing (ASI). Taxonomy and controlled vocabulary training course from taxonomist Heather Hedden, June 2020 Climbing Camelback: Intermediate and Advanced Topics in Indexing, ASI 2019 Conference, Scottsdale Practical Introduction to Indexing, ASI 2013 Conference, San Antonio BS (Biology), MBA(Operations), Professional Diploma in Web Centric Computing

Mamta, Thank you so much. I am super happy with this, both the product and the process, you making this easy for me.

{/* Professional Memberships and Voluntering */}

John Wilson, Author

Ecocide

Hi Mamta, I am very impressed, very pleased. Thank you for your excellent Index. I do like the layout, so clear simple, direct, and self-explanatory. I love the extra information in brackets. It is indeed a very helpful index.

); export default About;
